name: Watch Out ! He's Everywhere !
description:
----------------------------------------------

Story :

You live in a dystopian society control by a dictator who wants to have a total control on the population and who wants to eliminate the individuallity. But you play a rider who don't to live there anymore and you decided to go away from this country.

But don't forget that the eye of the dictator is everywhere and that he's always watching you ! 

Made for Zenojam #4

----------------------------------------------

Inputs :

Arrow keys / WASD : move the player

E : punch

Space : roll

----------------------------------------------

Credits :

Programming : Pguermon

Art : Zeboudin
